item.title: Community Bonding Period

item.description: Hello everyone! I am Tianxiao, a Master student of Swiss Federal Institute of Technology Lausanne (EPFL). It is really excited to take part in SOCIS this year for project Expand the scope of solarbextrapolation. I am looking forward to a different and productive summer.
